patients.name: Mark S.
patients.quote: I’ve not done genetic counseling before, but my initial thought is that a counselor would have to stick to the script—there’s no cure, no effective treatment, you know the drill.

patients.name: Kelly R.
patients.quote: I don’t trust that my data would not get into the hands of insurers and be the reason I am denied for certain types of health insurance in the near or far future.

patients.name: Rick N.
patients.quote: I would talk to your doctor not only about your concern regarding AD, but also your anxiety and depression. A genetic counselor can help you with the pros and cons of genetic testing.
